channel.title: [pi] error help [pi]
channel.description:
i get some errors when compiling i believe one of them needs to define a variable or whatever cant someone tell me what to do and 1 more error
src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:51: cannot find symbol symbol : variable grimPrize location: class server.model.players.Client if(c.grimPrize < 2) { ^ src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:58: cannot find symbol symbol : variable grimPrize location: class server.model.players.Client if(c.grimPrize == 1) { ^ src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:60: cannot find symbol symbol : variable grimPrize location: class server.model.players.Client } else if (c.grimPrize == 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:62: cannot find symbol symbol : variable grimPrize location: class server.model.players.Client } else if (c.grimPrize == 3) { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:823: cannot find symbol symbol : variable grimPrize location: class server.model.players.Client c.grimPrize = 2; ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:824: sendNpcChat1(java.lang.String) in ser ver.model.players.DialogueHandler cannot be applied to (java.lang.String,int,jav a.lang.String) c.getDH().sendNpcChat1("Talk to me again.", 6390, "Grim Reaper"); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 6 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: [pi] error help [pi]
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

you need to add the variable grimprize in your client class

Read full topic
